events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund because it does not match what I purchased.
The case has been classified under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back due to incorrect shipment.
Support agent Anna has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the wrong item delivered to the customer.
Hello! I'm Anna, Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item received so that I can process your refund quickly?
Sure, the order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the wrong product that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund and arrange for a free return shipping label to send the incorrect item back.
That sounds great, thank you for the prompt solution. I look forward to receiving the refund and return label.
The refund has been processed and the return shipping label has been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and that the return process is going smoothly. Please contact us if there are any issues.
As the refund was successfully received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
